creator: bart.van.kuik@oracle.com
text:
The netcomponents stuff has been renamed and moved to
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/net/, but this is not reflected on the page
that is found at address as noted in the URL field.

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
The online manual refers to the currently released version which does indeed
depend on the old version. Ant 1.6 has been updated and when it is release the
manual will be updated to that version. It does contain the correct information.

Thanks for the report
